## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0a828213f28eb11c1587a2191e38abeaf3f0a12c564276bb39d91464e9a85482)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'walletconnect-website' @ 4.4.4 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
